segments.text: initially appears engrossed in their smartphones
their faces illuminated by the screens
while the smartphones that once occupied the attention of the pair in the middle are now set aside,
occasionally panning to capture the reactions

critique:
They have white beverages, not colorful ones.
One of them is wearing a blue top with a yellow pattern, not a yellow top.
They are not looking at their phones.
Their faces are not illuminated by the screens.
It’s hard to tell if it’s night since the scene is indoors.
It’s a single shot, not a series of shots.
There are no smooth transitions.
There is no panning.
There are no transitions between close-ups and wider shots — it remains a full shot throughout.
